title: Sausalitos
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain restaurant offering American and American-Mexican food and cocktails with a small vegan menu section that includes burger, burrito, quesadilla, filled taco, wok. Has vegan cocktails (ask for no marshmallow or other sweets in the drinks).
